Vindictus.Lucky Sprint!! Event:
g]https://nxcache.nexon.net/cms/2025/q2/1021/ingame_loadingbanner_1920x663.jpg?width=1283&height=443&mode=max[/img]


 


[b][u]Event Period[/u]
[/b]May 20th, 2025 (After Maintenance) - June 3rd, 2025 (Before Maintenance)


<sub>(* Per Character Event)</sub>


 



 


[u][b]Event Details[/b][/u]


1. Gain the "Lucky Sprint" Boon when playing Raid battles during the event.


2. The Boon tier increases 1 time upon completing a raid, up to 5 stages.


- [u]The "Lucky Sprint" Boon stage resets every day at 9 AM UTC during the event period.[/u]


- Stage increases by 1 for clearing a raid once, regardless of the raid's difficulty(Solo, Normal, Hero+).


- Resenlian's Battle Completion Scrol does not increase the Boon stage when used.


[u]- The "Lucky Sprint" Boon does not apply to Redeemers/Space Time Distortion battles.[/u]


<sub>(* Detailed List of eligible battles are listed at the end of the page)</sub>
